dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5022 IH: Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Marshall (for himself, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, Mrs. Bustos, and Mrs. Dingell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize funding for the voluntary public access and habitat incentive program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2018.

section.header: Voluntary public access and habitat incentive program
section.text: Section 1240R(f)(1) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3839bb–5(f)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking practicable, $50,000,000 and inserting the following: “practicable—
in subparagraph (A) (as so designated), by striking 2012 and $40,000,000 and inserting the following: “2012;
in subparagraph (B) (as so designated), by striking the period at the end and inserting the following: “; and

subparagraph.text: $150,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2019 through 2023.
